/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their facades painted in a palette of blue, white, and gray, reflecting the urban architecture of the city. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with wispy clouds, providing a serene contrast to the busy street below.
